The mountain cow who was foolish, incomp: She takes a step with a fore-hoof, but before it is properly set down, she lifts up a hind-hoof.
She doesn’t go somewhere she’s never been before, or eat grass and drink water that she’s never tried before.
She never returns safely to the place she had started from.
The mendicant who has slipped and fallen: They enter and remain in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.
They’re not able to enter and remain in the second absorption.
They’re not able to enter and remain in the first absorption.
The mountain cow who was astute, compete: She takes a step with a fore-hoof, and after it is properly set down, she lifts up a hind-hoof.
She goes somewhere she’s never been before, and eats grass and drinks water that she’s never tried before.
She returns safely to the place she had started from.
The astute, competent, skillful mendican: They enter and remain in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.

They enter and remain in the second absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of immersion, with internal clarity and confidence, and unified mind, without placing the mind and keeping it connected.

They enter and remain in the third absorption, where they meditate with equanimity, mindful and aware, personally experiencing the bliss of which the noble ones declare, “Equanimous and mindful, one meditates in bliss.”
They enter and remain in the fourth absorption, without pleasure or pain, with pure equanimity and mindfulness.
They enter and remain in the dimension of infinite space.
They enter and remain in the dimension of infinite consciousness.
They enter and remain in the dimension of nothingness.
They enter and remain in the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
They enter and remain in the cessation of perception and feeling.
The capabilities of the mendicant who en: Their mind becomes pliable and workable.
Their immersion becomes limitless and well developed.
They become capable of realizing anything that can be realized by insight to which they extend the mind, in each and every case.
They become capable of wielding the many kinds of psychic power.
They become capable of hearing both kinds of sounds, human and divine, whether near or far.
They become capable of understanding the minds of other beings and individuals.
They become capable of recollecting many kinds of past lives.
They become capable of seeing sentient beings passing away and being reborn.
They become capable of realizing the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and live having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements.
